tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE malware_activity_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  malware_type VARCHAR(50),
  action_taken VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE malware_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    logged_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES malware_activity(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareDetection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    detected_malware VARCHAR(50),
    detection_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (log_id) REFERENCES MalwareLogs(log_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_activity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_ip VARCHAR(50),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(50),
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE malware_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE malware_hosts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    host_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ip_address VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    malware_type VARCHAR(50),
    last_scan_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE malware_attacks (
    attack_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    host_id INT NOT NULL,
    attack_type VARCHAR(50),
    attack_date TIMESTAMP,
    attack_details TEXT
);
